cz.syntea.xdef.xml

Interface KXquery

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    KXqueryExpr

    public interface KXquery
    Interface provides methods for XQuery expression.

      • newExpression

        KXquery newExpression(java.lang.String source)
        Creates a new instance of KXQueryExpr from other expression with compiled new expression. The name space context, functions and variables are retrieved from the argument.
        Parameters:
        source - String with XQuery expression.
        Returns:
        the KXqueryExpr object.
